title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4403.9 - Approval of plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4403.9 - Approval of plan

State Regulations

The commission may approve a plan of operation finally or
conditionally and may provide in such order of approval any limitations or
conditions upon the authority of the corporation to operate and conduct
off-track betting. Should the commission grant temporary authority, such
authority shall be for such limited period of time as may be set forth in its
order. The commission may reconsider its action in respect of the approval or
disapproval of a plan of operation at any time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4403.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
